name: Mood Swings (itch)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2!   (Download below)

Story:

Imagine, that you are the best programmer ever on this planet! Now, imagine that your robot got corrupted. Well, that would be kinda bad, wouldn’t it?

But now, it actually happened, and you are the only one to save the whole world from your beloved robot who went on a rampage!

Please, save us, game developers, from this chaos, and keep in mind: the clock is ticking!

Controls: wasd+space

Task: To reach the end before the time is up

Tools: Unity 2020.3

Type: 3D platformer, focused on speed

Authors: Tünde Flesch, Kristóf Kovács, Bálint Vigh, Viktória Nagy-Szabó

Special thanks to:

Unity asset store: Nox Metrica(clock), Lemon Spawn(skybox),  Nobiax / Yughues(metal textures), FireBolt Studios(scifi textures).

Music by: Graham Bole – Chilling Oot at Skynet
